entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as being convinced he had gone too far.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who has a curious and satisfied expression on his face when answering Harry.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Another name for Harry, used by Snape to address him.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: A group of dark creatures that are swooping towards Harry across the lake in the grounds.

relationships.description: Harry and Snape stare at each other, with Snape having a curious expression on his face.
Dementors are swooping towards Harry across the lake in the grounds.
Snape is standing in front of Harry, muttering under his breath and trying to Legilimise him.
Harry raises his wand and casts the Protego spell to defend himself against the dementors.
